title: mm插件
author: 细致A
txt_content: mm怪物插件打怪死掉之后可以不可以让怪不重新消失刷新，让他一直在副本呆着，这样一个人打不了副本

replies.author: Salt_lovely
replies.txt_content:
假如说你现在有一个怪物
SkeletalKnight:
  Type: WITHER_SKELETON
  Health: 40
  Damage: 8
  Drops:
  - GOLD_NUGGET{display="Gold Coin"} 1-2 0.5
  Options:
    MovementSpeed: 0.1复制代码
你只需要在Options下面添加义一项Despawn:false就行
SkeletalKnight:
  Type: WITHER_SKELETON
  Health: 40
  Damage: 8
  Drops:
  - GOLD_NUGGET{display="Gold Coin"} 1-2 0.5
  Options:
    MovementSpeed: 0.1
    Despawn:false复制代码
注意空格缩进
